problem_text_cn: 如图,PA、PB、CD是⊙O的切线,切点分别是A、B、E,CD分别交PA、PB于C、D两点,若∠APB=60°,则∠COD的度数()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, PA, PB, and CD are the tangent lines of ⊙O, and the tangent vertices are A, B, and E respectively. CD intersects PA and PB at C and D respectively. If ∠APB = N_0, then the degree of ∠COD is ()
raw_answer: 连接AO,BO,OE,∵PA、PB是O的切线,∴∠PAO=∠PBO=90°,∵∠APB=60°∴∠AOB=360°-2×90°-60°=120°,∵PA、PB、CD是O的切线,∴∠ACO=∠ECO,∠DBO=∠DEO,∴∠AOC=∠EOC,∠EOD=∠BOD,∴∠COD=∠COE+∠EOD=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=60^{°}.故选B.
